languages.text: "Начинаю процедуру идентификации. Данная единица определяется как логис Оптикон-22 и является //полномочным представителем//структурной частью// эксплораторского флота Осознание, братство {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Опции обмена информацией, укрепления дипломатических связей и //торговых сделок//пожертвований// разблокированы".

traits.locale_text: "Добро пожаловать, новый покупатель! Я — Объект-6502. От лица флота Осознание приветствую вас! Могу я помочь вам с выбором товаров? Рассказать о нашем сотрудничестве с мирянами? Или ответить на ваши вопросы?"

languages.text: "Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon-22 and is a //fully authorised representative//structural part// of the Cognisance Fleet and the priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, //trade deals//donations//."
languages.original_text: "Начинаю процедуру идентификации. Данная единица определяется как логис Оптикон-22 и является //полномочным представителем//структурной частью// эксплораторского флота Осознание, братство {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}. Опции обмена информацией, укрепления дипломатических связей и //торговых сделок//пожертвований// разблокированы".

traits.locale_text: "Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon 22 and is a fully authorised representative/structural part of the Cognisance Fleet and the brotherhood of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, trade deals/donations."

"Welcome, new customer! I am Subject 6502. On behalf of the Consciousness Fleet, I greet you! Can I assist you with your choice of goods? Or tell you about our collaboration with laymen? Or answer your questions?"

"Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon 22 and is a fully authorised representative/structural part of the Cognisance Fleet and the brotherhood of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, trade deals/donations."

"Welcome, new customer! I am Unit 6502. On behalf of the Cognizance Fleet, I greet you! Can I assist you with your choice of goods? Or tell you about our collaboration with laypeople? Or answer your questions?"

"Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon 22 and is a fully authorised representative/structural part of the Cognisance Fleet and the brotherhood of the Adeptus Mechanicus. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, trade deals/donations."

"Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon-22 and is a //fully authorised representative//structural part// of the Cognisance Fleet and the priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, //trade deals//donations//."

languages.text: 「識別手順を開始。このユニットは論理学者オプティコン-22として定義されており、コグニサンス艦隊の//正式に認可された代理人および//構造部品//であり、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の組合員です。次のオプションへのアクセスが許可されました。情報交換、外交関係の強化、//貿易取引//寄付//」
languages.original_text: "Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon-22 and is a //fully authorised representative//structural part// of the Cognisance Fleet and the priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, //trade deals//donations//."

traits.locale_text: 「識別手順を開始。このユニットは論理学者オプティコン-22として定義されており、コグニサンス艦隊の//正式に認可された代理人および//構造部品//であり、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}の組合員です。次のオプションへのアクセスが許可されました。情報交換、外交関係の強化、//貿易取引//寄付//」

languages.text: “启动身份识别程序。本单位被定义为逻辑士奥普蒂孔22号，是真理开拓者舰队和{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的//构架结构//完全授权代表//。允许访问下列选项：信息交流、加强外交联系，//贸易协议//捐赠//。”
languages.original_text: "Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon-22 and is a //fully authorised representative//structural part// of the Cognisance Fleet and the priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, //trade deals//donations//."

traits.locale_text: “启动身份识别程序。本单位被定义为逻辑士奥普蒂孔22号，是真理开拓者舰队和{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}兄弟会//构架结构//完全授权代表。允许访问下列选项：信息交流、加强外交联系，//贸易协议//捐赠//。”

languages.text: «Iniciando proceso de identificación. Esta unidad recibe el distintivo Opticon-22 y sirve como //representante con plena autoridad//parte estructural// de la Flota Conciencia y el sacerdocio del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Se ha concedido el acceso a las siguientes opciones: intercambio de información, fomento de relaciones diplomáticas, //acuerdos comerciales//donaciones//».
languages.original_text: "Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon-22 and is a //fully authorised representative//structural part// of the Cognisance Fleet and the priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, //trade deals//donations//."

traits.locale_text: «Iniciando proceso de identificación. Esta unidad recibe el distintivo Opticon-22 y sirve como //representante con plena autoridad//parte estructural// de la Flota Conciencia y la hermandad del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Se ha concedido el acceso a las siguientes opciones: intercambio de información, fomento de relaciones diplomáticas, //acuerdos comerciales//donaciones//».

languages.text: « Lancement de la procédure d'identification. Cette unité répondant au nom de Logis Opticon-22 est un //représentant officiel//élément structurel// de la Flotte de la Connaissance et du clergé de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. L'accès aux options suivantes a été autorisé : échange d'informations, renforcement des liens diplomatiques, //accords commerciaux//dons//. »
languages.original_text: "Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon-22 and is a //fully authorised representative//structural part// of the Cognisance Fleet and the priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, //trade deals//donations//."

traits.locale_text: « Lancement de la procédure d'identification. Cette unité répondant au nom de Logis Opticon-22 est un //représentant officiel//élément structurel// de la Flotte de la Connaissance et de la fraternité de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. L'accès aux options suivantes a été autorisé : échange d'informations, renforcement des liens diplomatiques, //accords commerciaux//dons//. »

languages.text: "Initialisiere Identifikationsprozess. Diese Einheit ist definiert als Logis Opticon-22 und ist ein //vollautorisierter Repräsentant//struktureller Bestandteil// der Erkenntnisflotte und der Priesterschaft des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Zugriff auf folgende Optionen gewährt: Informationsaustausch, Stärkung diplomatischer Beziehungen, //Handelsgeschäfte//Spenden//."
languages.original_text: "Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon-22 and is a //fully authorised representative//structural part// of the Cognisance Fleet and the priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, //trade deals//donations//."

traits.locale_text: "Initialisiere Identifikationsprozess. Diese Einheit ist definiert als Logis Opticon-22 und ist ein //vollautorisierter Repräsentant//struktureller Bestandteil// der Erkenntnisflotte und der Bruderschaft des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Zugriff auf folgende Optionen gewährt: Informationsaustausch, Stärkung diplomatischer Beziehungen, //Handelsgeschäfte//Spenden//."

languages.text: "Kimlik bildirme işlemi başlatılıyor. Bu birim, Logis Opticon-22 olarak tanımlanmaktadır ve Malumat Filosu ile {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} rahipliğinin //tam yetkiye sahip bir temsilcisidir//önemli bir yapısal parçasıdır//. Şu seçeneklere erişim verilmiştir: Bilgi alışverişi, diplomatik bağların güçlendirilmesi, //ticaret anlaşmaları//bağışlar//."
languages.original_text: "Initiating identification procedure. This unit is defined as Logis Opticon-22 and is a //fully authorised representative//structural part// of the Cognisance Fleet and the priesthood of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Access has been granted to the following options: information exchange, strengthening of diplomatic links, //trade deals//donations//."

traits.locale_text: "Kimlik tespiti başlatılıyor. Bu birim Logis Opticon-22 olarak tanımlanıyor ve Malumat Filosu ile {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Rahipliği'nin //tam yetkiye sahip bir temsilcisi//önemli bir yapı taşı//. Şu seçenekler için erişim verildi: Bilgi paylaşımı, diplomatik bağların güçlendirilmesi, //ticaret anlaşmaları//bağışlar//."
